com.google.gdata.devtools.eclipse
Class DependencyManager

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gdata.devtools.eclipse.DependencyManager

public class DependencyManager
extends java.lang.Object

A utility class to provide various functionalities for the dependencies.

Method Detail

downloadDependencies

public static void downloadDependencies(java.util.List<DependencyConfig> dependencyConfigList,
                                        FileTemplateConfig templateConfig,
                                        java.lang.String extDependencyPath,
                                        org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor,
                                        int noOfTicks)
                                 throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
Downloads the external dependency jars required for the template defined by FileTemplateConfig element and according to the List of DependencyConfig elements. They will be downloaded to the local file system whose path is defined by extDependencyPath.

Parameters:
dependencyConfigList - the List of external dependency configurations
templateConfig - the template configuration
extDependencyPath - the output local file system path
monitor - the progress monitor
noOfTicks - the number of ticks allocated
Throws:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - if anything goes wrong while downloading

getGoogleDataDependencies

public static java.util.HashSet<org.eclipse.jdt.core.IClasspathEntry> getGoogleDataDependencies(java.lang.String javaClientLibPath,
                                                                                                FileTemplateConfig templateConfig)
                                                                                         throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
Returns a HashSet of all the Google Data Java Client libraries required by the template defined by FileTemplateConfig element found at path given by javaClientLibPath.

Parameters:
javaClientLibPath - the absolute path on the local file system
templateConfig - the template configuration element
Returns:
A HashSet of all the Google Data Java Client libraries of type IClasspathEntry
Throws:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - if anything goes wrong

getExtDependencies

public static java.util.HashSet<org.eclipse.jdt.core.IClasspathEntry> getExtDependencies(java.lang.String extDependencyPath,
                                                                                         FileTemplateConfig templateConfig)
                                                                                  throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
Returns a HashSet of all the external dependency libraries required by the template defined by FileTemplateConfig element found at path given by extDependencyPath.

Parameters:
extDependencyPath - the absolute path on the local file system
templateConfig - the template configuration element
Returns:
A HashSet of all the external dependency libraries of type IClasspathEntry
Throws:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - if anything goes wrong
